unnormalised: Hey, did anyone else see that article about the surge in Dengue cases in Delhi? Dr. Sharma was saying it's crucial to get tested ASAP if you have a fever and body ache. My neighbor's kid just got diagnosed, poor thing! They're giving him Paracetamol 650mg and lots of fluids. Scary stuff! Gotta be extra careful with mosquitoes this season.
normalised: Hey, did anyone else see that article about the surge in Dengue cases in Delhi? Doctor Sharma was saying it's crucial to get tested A-S-A-P if you have a fever and body ache. My neighbor's kid just got diagnosed, poor thing! They're giving him Paracetamol six hundred and fifty milligram and lots of fluids. Scary stuff! Gotta be extra careful with mosquitoes this season.
